name: Echo
bio: Echo is a dream-pop band known for their ethereal soundscapes and haunting melodies. Formed in 2015, they have captivated audiences with their unique blend of electronic and acoustic elements.

name: Mirage
bio: Mirage is a synthwave band that brings the sounds of the 80s into the modern era. With their vibrant synth lines and catchy hooks, they create a nostalgic yet fresh auditory experience.

name: Solar
bio: Formed in 2012, Solar is a progressive rock band that explores the cosmic and the terrestrial through their expansive compositions and intricate musicianship.

name: Crimson
bio: Crimson is a heavy metal band that has been shaking the underground scene since 2009. Known for their aggressive riffs and powerful vocals, they deliver an intense musical experience.

name: Velvet
bio: Velvet blends alternative rock with post-punk influences to create a dark and brooding sound. Their melancholic lyrics and atmospheric instrumentals have garnered a dedicated following.

name: Midnight Mirage
bio: Midnight Mirage is an indie rock band that captures the essence of late-night contemplation through their introspective lyrics and smooth guitar melodies.

name: Aurora
bio: Aurora is a folk band that draws inspiration from nature and personal stories. Their harmonies and acoustic arrangements paint vivid pictures in the minds of their listeners.

name: Lunar Echoes
bio: Lunar Echoes is an experimental band that pushes the boundaries of sound with their eclectic mix of genres and innovative use of technology in music production.

name: Stellar
bio: Stellar is a post-rock band known for their expansive soundscapes and emotional crescendos. Their music takes listeners on a journey through the highs and lows of the human experience.

name: Phoenix
bio: Phoenix is a pop-rock band with anthemic choruses and uplifting melodies. Since their formation in 2018, they have been spreading positivity and energy through their music.
